item.description:
Architecture for Humanity Boston and Edge of Seven invite you to a fun event for a worthwhile cause: a battle of the bands on Thursday, November 17 at 8:30 pm to raise funds to build schools in rural Nepal.

At the event we will hear music from various local and regional rock bands and solo performers including: I Love Diane, AO, The Lowbred Watts, Jason Zavala and The Van Buren Boys.

The event will also feature sounds from DJ Tone Terra. Harpoon Brewery will be donating 100% of the Harpoon sales from the night to our cause! So if you come out, make sure to have a Harpoon or two! (This is a 21+ event)
item.name: Architecture for Humanity Invites you to Schoolhouse Rock, Thursday Nov. 17
